title: Lamp Post
summaries: The Lamp Post is a piece of furniture that emits light. It can be placed underwater and can be toggled with wires.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it counts as a light source for housing while on <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked> and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked> versions, it doesn't.

statistics.Sell: 1 SC

ingredients.value:
